amendment.description: To provide VISTA volunteers the option of receiving a national service educational award.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2184 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2184 proposed by Senator Bond for Senator Clinton to Amendment SA 2150. (consideration: CR S14520-14524; text: CR S14521) To provide VISTA volunteers the option of receiving a national service educational award.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2184 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2184 proposed by Senator Bond for Senator Clinton to Amendment SA 2150.
